channel.title: CVE Feed for villatheme -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for villatheme -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-41623|2024-08-03T12:49:43.590Z -- villatheme -- ald%20-%20aliexpress%20dropshipping%20and%20fulfillment%20for%20woocommerce%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Sensitive Data Exposure in Villatheme ALD - AliExpress Dropshipping and Fulfillment for WooCommerce premium plugin <= 1.1.0 on WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2024-4039|2024-08-01T20:26:57.279Z -- villatheme -- orders%20tracking%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The The Orders Tracking for WooCommerce plugin for WordPress for WordPress is vulnerable to arbitrary shortcode execution in all versions up to, and including, 1.2.10. This is due to the plugin allowing users to execute an action that does not properly validate a value before running do_shortcode. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to execute arbitrary shortcodes. A partial patch was released in 1.2.10, and a complete patch was released in 1.2.11.

item.title: CVE-2024-4039|2024-06-04T17:53:54.286Z -- villatheme -- orders%20tracking%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The The Orders Tracking for WooCommerce plugin for WordPress for WordPress is vulnerable to arbitrary shortcode execution in all versions up to, and including, 1.2.10. This is due to the plugin allowing users to execute an action that does not properly validate a value before running do_shortcode. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to execute arbitrary shortcodes. A partial patch was released in 1.2.10, and a complete patch was released in 1.2.11.
